title: P2P Advertiser Information (request)
description: Retrieve information about a P2P advertiser. **This API call is still in Beta.**

id.description: [Optional] The unique identifier for this advertiser. If not provided, returns advertiser information about the current account.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
